parameters.name: inputImageDir
parameters.tooltip: Select the folder that contains the input image files.

parameters.name: outputTransformDir
parameters.tooltip: Select the folder where the output registration transform files are to be written.

parameters.name: outputImageDir
parameters.tooltip: Select the folder where the output registered image files are to be written.

parameters.name: allowRotation
parameters.tooltip: Allow rotation of the images in the registration transformations.

parameters.name: input
parameters.tooltip: Select the folder that contains the input image sequence to be subsetted.

parameters.name: output
parameters.tooltip: Select the folder where the output images will be written.

parameters.name: rmDups
parameters.tooltip: Remove images that are identical to the previous image in the sequence.

parameters.name: rmSingles
parameters.tooltip: Remove images that appear only once in the original image sequence.

parameters.name: rmNonBWs
parameters.tooltip: Remove images that have pixels that are not gray-level.
